TopicTitle: Need help with Eva Construction bug

Articles.Content:
I am making a small space station for a contract in a career save and i forgot to put an antenna so instead of replacing the modules i wanted to do some eva construction but when i place the antennae on the station, Bill doesnt move and only moves barely also i noticed my craft is moving relative to my rcs inputs. So what i mean is when i point to the ship and burn using the eva jetpack the ship moves to me Bill doesnt move. I did manage to get into the capsule of my ship but when i eva again Bill was still stuck in place, i tried restarting the game loading a quicksave and tried to look up on what happend and why but i couldnt find anything.

This is what i did on my little "journey"

-got 2 antannae from the craft into Bills inv

-normally used the jetpack to get to the station and put both antannae

-then i got stuck in place and noticed my craft was moving relative to my inputs

I am so confused and i need help to finish this contract, if you have any ideas i will gladly give it a try.

It's been a while but I just recently came across similar stories. So, apparently an engineer sometimes welds themselves to the vessel they were working on. Quicksave/-reload or switching to the tracking station and back should help.
Never seen it happen in my (surface) construction work.

Maybe the Kerbal got wedged in between station and antenna.
